headline: Moderna (NasdaqGS:MRNA) Added to Russell Midcap Indexes
summary: Moderna (NasdaqGS:MRNA) recently experienced significant index changes, with the company being added to the Russell Midcap and Midcap Value indexes, while being dropped from several others. Over the last quarter, its share price recorded a notable rise of 28%, against a backdrop of a flat broader market. This performance could be partly influenced by these index adjustments, as they often affect institutional investment decisions. Additionally, developments such as expanded collaborations and...
